ygData.subject: Mistmoore raid (E'ci server)
ygData.msgSnippet: For the E ci bards: Yesterday I posted about an event I m trying to schedule in Mistmoore. Thats still in the works.  Wanted to let all the E ci bards know
ygData.messageBody:
For the E'ci bards:

Yesterday I posted about an event I'm trying to schedule in Mistmoore.
Thats still in the works. Wanted to let all the E'ci bards know that there
is a raid scheduled tonight in Mistmoore (6PM PST). Bextrii is running it
and if you don't know her she knows a lot about conducting raids in MM. If
you don't have a gypsy lute yet, tonight would be a good opportunity for you
to get one for free (assuming bards camping the castle don't need one).

Galtin of E'ci
30 bard
